news.title: Does the URL You Link to in Google My Business Impact Ranking in the Local Pack?
news.description: The content of the page you link to from your GMB listing can make a difference with regard to ranking in local results, and for most businesses it makes sense to link to the home page.

news.title: Google: No Need To Worry About Duplicate Content With Site Migrations
news.description: According to a statement on Twitter from Google’s John Mueller, duplicate content should not be a matter of concern in the context of migrating that content from one site to another.

news.title: Google Creates a New Way to Drive Traffic Via Image Search
news.description: A recent Google Images update serves to add more context to pictures that are included in search results via snippets of information culled from Google’s Knowledge Graph feature.

news.title: The Ultimate List of SEO Statistics for 2020
news.description: Search statistics in this extensive list include information related to Google ranking factors, backlinks, voice search, keywords, local SEO, mobile optimization, video SEO, and more.

news.title: The Most Memorable Google Algorithm Updates of All Time
news.description: Veteran SEOs consider Google’s 2003 Florida update and the 2011 Panda update to be among the most consequential in terms of shaping the online search industry going forward.

news.title: How a Local Business Should Respond to Negative Reviews
news.description: Strategies for managing negative online reviews include regularly monitoring your reviews on relevant platforms, responding promptly and professionally, and adding more good reviews.
